attributes.action: puts forward a recomendation that Alexei Sayle receives a knighthood for his contribution to contempory comedy, and his priceless work conveying information accross to the public, addressing social issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
